segments.text: Now let's use the weight machines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . They've all got built-in TVs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool ! We can watch Ally Mcneal !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we could just stay there for 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What exercises can I do to firm up my backside
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would recommend doing some squats . Spread your feet about shoulder-length apart , toes facing forward , and slowly bend at your knees .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Keep your back straight and look forward . Good . Do about 3 sets of 20 .
segments.speaker: S1
